question:
Which of the following events are held in various parts of India?
  1. Rukuna Rath Yatra
  2. Bali Jatra
  3. Indra Jatra
  4. Bargarh Dhanua Jatra
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The Rukuna Rath Yatra is a chariot festival celebrated annually in Odisha. It is one of the biggest festivals celebrated in Bhubaneswar. It is celebrated between March and April and was recently featured on the Odisha tableau in the Republic Day parade.Â  The Rukuna Rath Yatra of Lord Lingaraja is performed for Lord Shiva. It is performed on the day of Basanti Durga Puja or Ashokashtami- on the day preceding the Ramanavami. The chariot features Chandrasekhar (Lord Lingaraja), Basudeva and Rukmini.

Rests three are also celebrated in India. Indra Jatra is though the largest festival of Nepal, it is also celebrated officially in Gangtok, in Sikkim since 2010.
